document.full_text: pedro feliciano said he was stung by the the mets' pitching coach's acknowledgment that feliciano's heavy usage was a reason the team did not re-sign him.
document.title: feliciano stung by mets pitching coach's comments
lines_and_colors: pedro feliciano said he was stung by the the mets' pitching coach's acknowledgment that feliciano's heavy usage was a reason the team did not re-sign him.
